net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Install Meters
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Execute this macro on the same map as the target Token Library. You will be prompted to select a Token Library to profile. You will also be prompted to select a target token to become "Lib:ProfilerProxy". This token need not currrently be an existing Token Library or any other functional token of any kind. It will be renamed to become "Lib:ProfileProxy" and automatically populated with profiled versions of the source library's User Defined Functions. Therefore, a disposable token is desired.
